paragraphs: I'm Michał (pronounce me-how) and that's my website.
My name is Michał (I'm polish, so pronounce it "me-how" or just use english version Michael). And as you guessed - I'm from Poland. The guy in the picture is me.
I'm working as a web developer for a few years now. Most of my professional life I spent in creativestyle.
Sometimes I write nonsense. As a developer I'm big fan of Vue.js. As a person, I'm a big fan of cold beer in a hammock out in nature.

privacyNotice.title: Privacy Notice
privacyNotice.text: This website does not collect, store, or process any personal data, and it does not use cookies. However, since this website is hosted on GitHub Pages, the GitHub Privacy Statement applies. For statistical purposes, Cloudflare Web Analytics is used.

paragraphs: If you want to contact me for any reason, the easiest way is to catch me on social media.
